metadata.title: CVE-2024-36699 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Rejected reason: DO NOT USE THIS CVE RECORD. ConsultIDs: none. Reason: Thisrecord was withdrawn by its CNA. Further investigation showed that it wasnot a security issue. Notes: none.

criterions.comment: gdb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
